purpose: Assess technical skills, system design, and practical experience

python_engineering.question: Would you consider yourself an expert-level Python engineer? Can you share examples of complex systems you've built with Python?
follow_ups: What design patterns do you commonly use?
How do you handle error handling and logging in production systems?
What's your approach to testing complex Python applications?

python_engineering.question: How would you design a Python application that needs to process millions of records efficiently?
follow_ups: When would you use async vs multiprocessing?
How would you handle memory constraints?
What monitoring would you put in place?

llm_frameworks.question: Which agent or LLM frameworks have you used? (Examples: LangChain, LangGraph, LlamaIndex, AutoGen, CrewAI)
follow_ups: What are the key differences between these frameworks?
When would you choose one over another?
What limitations have you encountered?

llm_frameworks.question: Have you built or worked with LLM-based autonomous agents before? Can you briefly describe one example?
follow_ups: How did you handle agent failures or hallucinations?
What tools did you integrate and why?
How did you manage context and memory?

llm_frameworks.question: Explain how LLM Orchestration works and when you would use it.

rag_architecture.question: Walk through the architecture of a RAG or GenAI system you designed. How did data ingestion, embedding, vector storage, retrieval, and generation work end to end?
follow_ups: How did you handle document chunking?
What embedding model did you use and why?
How did you evaluate retrieval quality?
What challenges did you face with generation quality?

rag_architecture.question: Explain how RAG Architecture works and its key components.
What techniques would you use to improve RAG retrieval quality?

ml_production.question: Describe a machine learning system you built and operated in production. What was your role across the full lifecycleâ€”from data ingestion and model training to deployment, monitoring, and iteration?
follow_ups: How did you handle model versioning?
What monitoring and alerting did you set up?
How did you decide when to retrain?
What was your deployment strategy?

ml_production.question: How have you designed and managed data pipelines for large, noisy, real-world datasets? How did you handle missing data, outliers, schema consistency, and data validation?
Walk us through a project involving large-scale, time-series data. What tools did you use for ETL and pipeline orchestration, and what were your strategies for ensuring data quality?

cloud_deployment.question: What is your hands-on experience deploying and operating ML systems on cloud platforms? Which services did you use, and why?
follow_ups: How did you handle scaling?
What was your approach to cost management?
How did you ensure high availability?

cloud_deployment.question: How would you architect a scalable AI service that needs to handle variable load with cost efficiency?

security.question: Have you implemented authentication, access control, or security mechanisms for AI/ML systems or agent workflows?
follow_ups: How did you handle API key management?
What data protection measures did you implement?
How did you secure agent tool access?

integration.question: Have you integrated AI agents with external systems or APIs? Can you describe your approach?
Explain how MCP (Model Context Protocol) works.

debugging.question: Recount a time when a deployed model failed to meet expectations in production. What was your root-cause analysis process, and what steps did you take to diagnose and implement the final fix?
follow_ups: What tools did you use for debugging?
How did you prevent similar issues in the future?
What did you learn from this experience?

model_training.question: Describe your experience with fine-tuning LLMs. What approaches have you used (full fine-tuning, LoRA, QLoRA, etc.)?
Describe a project involving time-varying data or forecasting. How did you design features, validate models over time, detect drift, and retrain models to maintain performance?

concept_explanation.question: Explain how Agentic Workflows work and when you would use them.
What is Function Calling in LLMs and how does it enable tool use?
Explain the difference between dense and sparse retrieval in search systems.

technical_accuracy.description: Correctness of technical facts and concepts

practical_experience.description: Real hands-on experience with the technologies

system_thinking.description: Ability to see the bigger picture and consider trade-offs

communication_clarity.description: Ability to explain complex concepts clearly

hire_signals.strong: Demonstrates deep expertise, real experience, and strong problem-solving
hire_signals.moderate: Good foundational knowledge with some practical experience
hire_signals.weak: Limited experience or significant knowledge gaps
hire_signals.no: Concerning gaps or inability to demonstrate claimed skills
